message: Your turn Alice. How about a slightly better deal for me this time?  Considering the inflation, accepting now is in both our best interests.
I'll meet you halfway on your last offer, but I still think I deserve a bit more
Alice, let's stop wasting time.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit before inflation eats away at the value.  Agree now, and we both win.
